ADMA_API_file_path.description: ADMA_API_file_path is a path of the directory on the ADMA system. The format should be like path/to/directory, with 0 or more / in the path. when user asked to go to file or folder followed by a path, you should set this to the path.

ADMA_meta_data.description: ADMA_meta_data is the meta data of the file or folder on the ADMA server.

ADMA_API_file_path_list.type: list of ADMA API file path
ADMA_API_file_path_list.description: ADMA_API_file_path_list is a list of paths in the ADMA system.

ADMA_API_file_path_list_index.description: ADMA_API_file_path_list_index is the current index of ADMA_API_file_path_list.

ADMA_meta_data_list.description: ADMA_meta_data_list is a list of ADMA meta data of the file or folder on the ADMA server.

ADMA_url.description: ADMA_url is the url for the search page on the ADMA.

ADMA_menu_name.description: ADMA_menu_name is the name of the menu on the ADMA server.

JD_ENREEC_field_id.description: JD_ENREEC_field_id is the id of the field in ENREEC from John Deere. Note, this field_id is a long string, like 514a1e63-0000-1000-4052-e1e1e1263770, which is different from the field name, like 1863.

local_file_path.description: local_file_path is the file path of the file on the serv.

JD_ENREEC_field_name.description: JD_ENREEC_field_name is the name of the field in ENREEC from John Deere.

Realm5_variable_name_list.description: Realm5_variable_name_list is a list of variable names, which must be from [ 'wind_direction','wind_speed','temperature', 'humidity','pressure'].

Realm5_date_str.description: Realm5_date_str is the date string in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

ADMA_search_string.description: ADMA_search_string is the search string of the search on ADMA. This value is a single world extracted from user's instruction, or a single world related to the user's instruction.

user_instruction.description: user_instruction is the instruction of the user.

Google_drive_credentials.description: Google_drive_credentials is the file for the credentials of the Google Drive.

Google_drive_file_path_list.description: Google_drive_file_path_list is a list of paths in the Google Drive.

Google_drive_file_path.description: Google_drive_file_path is the path of the file on the Google Drive.

Google_drive_redirect_url.description: Google_drive_redirect_url is the url for the Google Drive.

variable_initializer.description: variable_initializer tries its best to initialize the value of the variables in the output list.

ADMA_list_directory.description: Given a ADMA API file path of directory on ADMA, return the list of paths for all the subdirectories and files under the directory.

ADMA_API_file_path_list_iterator.call_condition: Do not call this method if ADMA_API_file_path_list_index is greater than the length of ADMA_API_file_path_list. Otherwise,ADMA_API_file_path_list_iterator should be called several times until the value of ADMA_API_file_path_list_index is equal to the length of ADMA_API_file_path_list.
ADMA_API_file_path_list_iterator.description: Given a list of ADMA API file path and an index, return the path at the index and increase the index by 1.

ADMA_get_meta_data.description: Given a path on ADMA, return the meta data of the path on the ADMA server.

ADMA_push_to_meta_data_list.description: Given a meta data, push the meta data to the list.

ADMA_menu_option.description: Given a menu name and ADMA API file path, return the corresponding url of on the ADMA server.

JD_ENREEC_boundary_in_field.description: Given a field_id, return the file path of the boundary of the field in ENREEC from John Deere.

JD_ENREEC_fields.description: Return a file path of a json file that contains all the fields in ENREEC from John Deere.

JD_ENREEC_field_id_from_name.description: Given a field name, return the field_id of the field in ENREEC from John Deere.

Realm5_format_data_for_plot.description: Given a local file path containing the raw realm5 weather data file and a list variable names, return the file path of the formatted json data for plot. Note: Only call this if this file indeed contains the realm5 weather data file. Make sure to call this method after ADMA_download_file, if you want to plot the data later.

Realm5_generate_file_url.description: Given a date string, return the ADMA API file path of the raw realm5 weather data file. The date string should be in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

ADMA_download_file.description: Given a ADMA API file path on ADMA, download the file and return the local file path of the downloaded file.

ADMA_upload_file.description: Given a local file path and ADMA API file path, upload the file to the ADMA API file path on ADMA server and then return the ADMA API file path of the uploaded file.

ADMA_search.description: Given a ADMA API file path as root directory, and a search content, return the list of meta data for all the folders or directories under the root directory.

ADMA_url_extractor.description: Given a ADMA meta data, return the url on adma.

output_ADMA_url_browser.description: Given an url, open the url in a web browser. Make sure the url is what the user asked for.

output_ADMA_API_file_path_list_printer.description: Given a list of ADMA API file path, print the file path in a list format.

output_ADMA_meta_data_list_printer.description: Given a list of ADMA meta data, print the meta data in a list format.

output_ADMA_meta_data_printer.description: Given a ADMA meta data, print the meta data in a readable format.

output_JD_ENREEC_field_list_printer.description: Given a local file path containing a json file of JD ENREEC fields, print the file content in a readable format.

output_field_boundary_map.description: Given a local file path containing boundary of JD ENREEC field, show the boundary on a map.

output_plot_weather_data.description: Given a local file path containing the formatted realm5 weather data file, plot the weather data. Note: Only call this method if you have the formatted realm5 weather data file instead of raw realm5 weather data file.

output_download_file.description: Given a local file path, download the file to the local file path. Note: if the user asked to download a file and you have the local file path, you should call this method.

input_date_string.call_condition: If there's no valid date string in the Realm5_date_str, call this method.
input_date_string.description: Given the date string from the user, initialize Realm5_date_str in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD'

Google_drive_connect.call_condition: Call this if the value of Google_drive_redirect_url is empty.
Google_drive_connect.description: Connect to Google Drive, and return the credentials.

Google_drive_list_directory.description: Given a Google Drive credentials, return the list of paths for all the subdirectories and files under the directory of Google drive.

output_Google_drive_file_path_list_print.description: Given a list of Google Drive file path, print the file path in a list format.

Google_drive_download_file.description: Given a Google Drive file path and Google Drive Credentials, download the file and return the local file path of the downloaded file.

Google_drive_generate_credentials.call_condition: call this only if you have the Google_drive_redirect_url.
Google_drive_generate_credentials.description: Given Google drive redirect url, return the Google drive credentials.
